message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game.
You can do better than that, Alice! I'm being generous.
You think you're being generous, but I'm not buying it. This is a fairer split, Bob!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but you need to meet me halfway.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to give you the majority of the money without a fight!
You're getting close, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me. Meet me in the middle this time.
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'm not going to let you take more than half of the money!
You're really pushing me to the limit, Alice. This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my best offer - take it or leave it!
You're really trying to take everything, Alice. I'm not going to let you get away with it.
You're almost out of options, Bob. This is my final offer - take it or walk away with nothing!
You've left me no choice. I'm taking the whole thing. Better luck next time, Alice!
